sentences.english: Because the air is so cold and thin, the cabin has to be air-conditioned.
sentences.chinese: 由于空气又冷又稀薄客舱必须进行空气调节。

sentences.english: The air-conditioning system maintains a uniform temperature throughout the building.
sentences.chinese: 空气调节系统使整座建筑物保持恒温。

sentences.english: In the basement there is also a central air-conditioning for the whole building.
sentences.chinese: 地下室有一个中央空调为整个建筑提供空气调节。

definition: air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
cooling and heating/air conditioning and central heating
